commit.message:
Really only use PyUnicode_FromUnicode() for strings that contain lone surrogate, not for normal non-BMP strings and not for surrogate pairs on 16bit Unicode platforms.
See https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/3678

Reduce deprecated Py_UNICODE API usage if possible.
See https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/3678
Extend buildenv test to debug a MacOS problem.
Add a test for surrogate pairs in Unicode strings.
Limit PyUnicode_FromUnicode() usage to strings containing lone surrogates.
Comment out a platform specific test.
Extend the surrogate pairs test in a way that also works in Py2.
Extend tests and accept ambiguity of surrogate pairs in Unicode string literals when generated on 16bit Py2 systems.

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

title: Really only use PyUnicode_FromUnicode() when needed
